TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed ActivationOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the manner in which serviced components are activated in the application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The activation setting for the application defaults to `Library`.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of this enumeration.
[!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.enterpriseservi_18_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.enterpriseservi_18_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption Library = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that serviced components in the marked application are activated in the creator's process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption Server = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that serviced components in the marked application are activated in a system-provided process.
